LanguageData.PlantTallYellowGrass.label: tall grass
LanguageData.PlantTallYellowGrass.description: Wild tall grass. Significantly slows down anyone moving over it.
LanguageData.SavannaBush.label: bush
LanguageData.SavannaBush.description: A short shrub. Does not typically talk.
LanguageData.SavannaTreeAcacia.label: acacia tree
LanguageData.SavannaTreeAcacia.description: Native to subtropical regions throughout the world, the acacia trees grow in the harshest climates.
LanguageData.SavannaTreeBaobab.label: baobab tree
LanguageData.SavannaTreeBaobab.description: A large round tree native to tropical savannas.
